titleStmt.title: By the Queene. A proclamation for the dearth of corne
Proclamations. 1596-07-31
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

publicationStmt.publisher: By the deputies of Christopher Barker, printer to the Queenes most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Forbidding of engrossing of grain and requiring observance of STC 9202: Miscellaneous Documents. 1595; suspending manufacture of starch.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
